analysis.description:
Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/25/0x0a9b9d976de8e09f0b57d1d7f344abe77925145c.sol#114-115:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x0a9b9d976de8e09f0b57d1d7f344abe77925145c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/25/0x0a9b9d976de8e09f0b57d1d7f344abe77925145c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_a' of Slotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/25/0x0a9b9d976de8e09f0b57d1d7f344abe77925145c.sol#117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_minBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMinBetAmount (/unique_chucks/25/0x0a9b9d976de8e09f0b57d1d7f344abe77925145c.sol#190) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_maxBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMaxBetAmount (/unique_chucks/25/0x0a9b9d976de8e09f0b57d1d7f344abe77925145c.sol#196) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_pointer' of Slotthereum.setPointer (/unique_chucks/25/0x0a9b9d976de8e09f0b57d1d7f344abe77925145c.sol#203) is not in mixedCase
